wikitext.*:
'''''The Gryphon''''', first established in [[1897]], was a magazine produced by the [[University of Leeds]]. Several issues contain poems by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].

==December 1922==
Vol. 4. No. 3. Leeds University. This issue contains the poem ''[[The Clerkes Compleinte]]'' (p. 95), signed N.N.,<ref group=note>"N.N." is usually an abbreviation of [[Wikipedia: Nomen nescio|Nomen nescio]].</ref> and written by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].

==January 1923==
Vol. 4. No. 4. Leeds University. This issue contains the poem ''[[The Hoard|IÃºmonna Gold Galdre Bewunden]]'' (p. 130), written by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].

==June 1925==
New Series: Vol. 4. No. 6. Leeds University. This issue contains the poem ''[[Light as Leaf on Lindentree]]'' (p. 217), written by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
